name: Brerk Uni
description:
Break Uni!!!!!!

This game was made for One Minute Game jam #4

Destroy all enemies and planets

W A S D to move   /  Space to Dash / Left Click to shoot

*** I want to be able to play on the WebGL. But I tried and got a lot of problems. So I decided to download, sorry. T-T ***Now it can play on the WebGL :D.
